name: Inside Soccer (itch)
description:
Inside Soccer is a soccer/football game played indoors, soccer/football is played by robots indoors controlled by you the player, out score your opponent in this arcade style game where the only way to end is by declaring, there's no half times or restarting after goals are scored, just non stop soccer/football
play in 1 Player vs AI mode or 2 Player Local vs Player mode

XBox, PlayStation, Nintendo or equivalent controller required
